REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0184 reute u f BC-MALAYSIAN-TREASURY-BI 04-13 0089

TEXT.TITLE: MALAYSIAN TREASURY BILL RISES AT LATEST TENDER
TEXT.BODY: The central bank, Bank Negara, said yields on the 91-day Malaysian treasury bills rate rose slightly to 2.032 pct at this week's tender from 2.020 pct last week. Accepted bids ranged between 1.951 and 2.060 pct compared with 1.874 and 2.048 pct previously. Applications totalled 440 mln ringgit for the 100 mln of bills on offer. The bank said it will offer 100 mln ringgit of 91-day bills and 150 mln of 182-days at a tender closing on April 20. REUTER
